DataElement.preferredName: Vertebral Bone XRay Fracture Assessment Current Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to a current vertebral bone diagnostic radiology assessment for a fracture.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the x-ray assessment of vertebral bone for a fracture.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Of or relating to or constituting vertebrae.:Bone; a rigid connective tissue that makes up the skeleton of vertebrates.

Concepts.definition: Of or relating to or constituting vertebrae.
The structural organ comprised of specialized connective tissue that forms the skeletal components of the body.

Property.preferredDefinition: Examination of any part of the body for diagnostic purposes by means of roentgen rays, recording the image on a sensitized surface (such as photographic film).:A traumatic injury to the bone in which the continuity of the bone is broken. - 2003:Examination of the body by auscultation, palpation, percussion, inspection, and olfaction.  (Taber's)

Concepts.definition: Examination of any part of the body for diagnostic purposes by means of roentgen rays, recording the image on a sensitized surface (such as photographic film).
A traumatic injury to the bone in which the continuity of the bone is broken.

A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is there evidence of any vert
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is there evidence of any vertebral body fracture in current films relative to previous ones?
